## equivalent() function

checks if two lists have the same values in the same order using the default comparison operator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function equivalent(a: string[], b: string[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>string[]</code> | a list |
|  b | <code>string[]</code> | a list |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if both lists have the same values in the same order.
